programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Today the staff of Gulf Coast Veterinary Specialists, comes to the aid of the Houston Humane Society after they receive over 200 neglected animals that are confiscated during a pet store raid. Exotic animal specialist Danielle Inman and Dr. Sue Chen treat a wide variety of animals for issues related to neglect and mismanagement. Fortunately, almost all the animals make a full recovery and are placed into loving homes.

programme.title: Im Alive
programme.desc: IM ALIVE features the death-defying and moving stories of people who — regardless of the obstacles or consequences — were determined to survive an animal attack. Driven by thoughts of loved ones and the desire to live, these individuals found the strength to survive terrifying and unexpected encounters by some of natures most dangerous creatures. This inspirational drama combines victim interviews with true-to-life reenactments, giving a replay of the split-second decisions that saved lives. Over the course of 10 episodes, IM ALIVE immerses viewers in the psychological experience of those involved, focusing on what pulled them through and what left them powerfully changed. Every survivor had something to live for, and in that fleeting moment of chaos, their desire for life outshone the attack.

programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Jackson Galaxy is a cat behaviorist. He is the person who resolves conflicts or behavioral issues between the owners and their cats or even between the cats and other pets. These are attacks and misbehavior, and Jackson is a true cat-lover and a believer that any problem can be solved thanks to love, patience and proper handling. Taking good care of cats is a demanding process and a whole science, but in return you will get a loving and purring family member.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: US reality TV show follows the Irwin family through their adventures in continuing Steve Irwins legacy. The family share their wildlife experiences from their travels across the world. They show how they care for all the animals while giving insight into their family life at Australia Zoo where they live and work. The Australian family including mother Terri who is a naturalist and conservationist stars alongside daughter Bindi and son Robert who are fully immerse in animal life and their family.

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at the Bronx Zoo, one of the largest zoos in the USA and the largest city zoo the country has to offer. Opening their doors to camera crews, the daily operations of the world-famous animal sanctuary are revealed, as the staff keep their loving creatures healthy and happy. Renowned for its diverse collection of animals and wonderful exhibitions, the Bronx Zoo is one of the finest in the world, home to lions, bears, tigers, snow leopards, baboons, flamingos and many more extravagant species. This series showcases the effort, experience and expertise required to run the Bronx Zoo.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Join biologist and angling expert Jeremy Wade as he travels the world peering through our darkest, murky waters, investigating tales of mythical monsters, mutated beasts and depleting fish populations. The star of River Monsters is back to explain the unexplainable, as he investigates these reported sightings of unknown creatures. Whether its Lake Gardas reptilian monster, a species of pike the size of a man, a river monster deemed extinct in the Outback or South Africas fabled half-man, half-fish monster, Jeremy will need to use all of his experience if he is to catch, or even glimpse, these creatures.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet is a TV series entirely dedicated to love and care for animals. Thanks to a genius Dr. Jeff Young Denvers Planned Pethood Plus veterinary clinic is always busy and is taking care of 80,000-plus clients and their pets. Dr. Jeffs sharp surgical skills and his unconditional love for animals make him one of the most respected vets in the country. Dr. Jeff has a dedicated team of more than 30 veterinary staffers and once a month they go to remote locations where people do not have access to vets.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Follow aquarium enthusiasts Brett Raymer and Wayde King as they attempt to build some of the most luxurious fish tanks in the world. At Acrylic Tank Manufacturing, the brothers-in-law guide you through the design process and the building of their truly jaw-dropping aquariums. Experience the unveiling of finished tanks housed everywhere from restaurants and banks, to glamorous casinos and mansions. Join the duo in their Las Vegas workshop as they deliver some budget-shattering builds to their high-profile clientele.

programme.title: Life at Vet University
programme.desc: Documentary series following six students at the University of Pennsylvania School of Veterinary Medicine, as they prepare to complete their gruelling four-year education at one of the most prestigious veterinarian colleges in the world. Known as Penn Vet, the institute is recognised as one of the most distinguished schools in animal research and care, and the course requires the students full devotion if they wish to graduate as veterinarians. Watch the students as they meander their perpetual studies and put their learning into practice, growing both as people and professionals during the intense, consuming course.

programme.title: Treetop Cat Rescue
programme.desc: Climbing enthusiasts brother-in-law duo Shaun Sears and Tom Otto work together to rescue the felines that climb beyond capability and get stuck in Washington State. The experienced tree climbers do their best to rescue all of the cats they find out about whether a call comes in at day or night. With sometimes unfavourable weather, weak branches and bees nests to overcome the pair have to overcome obstacles and then have to avoid scaring the cats away as they approach.

Founded by Tia Maria Torres, the centre challenges the misconceptions surrounding bully breeds, such as pit bulls, with hopes of eventually rehoming them. programme.title: Tiger Shark Beach
programme.desc: Dr. Neil Hammerschlag answers the key questions of tiger shark science - where do these sharks mate, where do the pregnant females gestate, and where do they give birth?

programme.title: Flying Wild Alaska
programme.desc: Flying Wild Alaska is a reality television show following the lives of the Tweto family who live in the city of Unalakleet and run an important airline in Alaska, transporting passengers and supplies to isolated parts of the state. Jim, his wife Ferno, daughters Ariel and Ayla and a team of pilots provide service to hardly accessible villages on the Bering sea coastline, in often very dangerous missions. Join them in dramatic moments, as they face extreme weather conditions, from icy storms and strong winds to a two month long winter darkness.

programme.title: Animal Cops: Houston
programme.desc: Following the animal cruelty investigators of the House Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (HSPCA), this team work in a large area of Texas to investigate reports of animal cruelty and saving some from abusive situations. Working closely with local law enforcement due to not having arrest or warrant seeking powers on their own, the office permanently assigned Deputy Constable Christine Kendrick to assist the investigators in law enforcement issues that occur and charge people who bring abuse to innocent animals. Premiering in 2003 on Animal Planet, this American documentary TV series is the third in a collection of shows known as "Animal Planet Heroes". Each episode typically follows two to three stories of rescues including animals in abusive situations, neglectful conditions or animals injured or stuck in dangerous places.

Every day brings a new challenge, dispatchers receive around 25.000 calls annually, every of which requires prompt reaction.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alaskan Bush People is an American docudrama-style reality TV series revolving around the Brown family, members of which are trying to survive in the wilderness, far away from the society. programme.title: The Context
programme.desc: The presenter and his regular panel of guests discuss the most important and relevant news stories of the day with correspondents around the globe. Join for expert analysis of the latest big events and exclusive interviews covering various current affair issues.

programme.title: The Context USA
programme.desc: Special coverage from Washington DC and London, focusing on President Trumps second term.

programme.title: The Context USA
programme.desc: Special coverage from Washington DC and London, focusing on President Trumps second term.

programme.title: The SpeciaList
programme.desc: A travel guide to everywhere you want to be, curated by celebrated local insiders.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. This world renowned news and current affairs program has been recognised for its exceptional reporting at the Emmy Awards. BBC World News America won two Emmy awards for its coverage of the conflicts in Syria and the Central African Republic. You can catch up with this award winning broadcast team as they air multiple times a day throughout the week.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: In-depth news and current affairs review of the main political and economic stories of the day, featuring robust interviews with senior government and opposition figures, business and union leaders, and analytical reports that delve behind the headlines. Regular presenters cross-examine studio guests on details of policies, priorities, actions and inactions, on a range of domestic UK and international topics. There are weekly features on the arts, sports and the world of technology, and editors are not afraid to venture into niche, specialist and exotic areas from space travel to animal psychology. If the BBCs flagship Radio 4 Today programme sets the early morning news agenda for the day, then its late-night TV equivalent often gives the people in power some sleepless nights.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: The Travel Show is a BBC travel programme. The new programme launched in February 2014,[1] and is the immediate successor of long standing travel programme, Fast Track. Utilising a network of correspondents in London, Tokyo, Sydney, New York and Kuala Lumpur, the programme aims to provide unique insight into the world of travel. It first aired in the UK in late February, after Winter Olympics coverage, in a Friday morning slot on BBC Two. A Sunday evening slot was also added on the BBC News channel in April 2014 and BBC iPlayer.

programme.title: Talking Movies
programme.desc: Join for the latest news from the world of film, including everything from documentaries to mainstream, indie and world cinema. The show also explores the newest trends and issues in the world of cinema.

programme.title: Focus on Africa
programme.desc: Focus on Africa is a BBC news program broadcast globally and on local partner channels of the BBC in African countries. The program used to be presented by Komla Dumor each weekday from its inception until his death in 2014; now it is hosted by Sophie Ikenye, a news presenter from Kenya. The program includes news, sport and business from across Africa and the rest of the globe. Get the top African stories and keep up with the latest international events.

programme.title: BBC World News America
programme.desc: News presenter Katty Kay keeps you up to date with all the latest breaking news from America and the rest of the world on BBC World News America. programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest news from the BBC,which is designed to inform you on current affairs. The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: Newscast
programme.desc: Join BBC journalists including political editor Laura Kuenssberg, Europe editor Katya Adler, Brussels correspondent Adam Fleming and political correspondent Chris Mason in their weekly podcast discussing all of the news stories that matter to the people of the United Kingdom. The journalists know all about the stories that theyre talking about - they interview the most important people involved in the stories that feature in the news. They speak of their knowledge and understanding of the news in a way that is understandable for all. Laura is often in a car in the middle of a city where big politics stories are happening. Katya, Adam and Chris are usually in the studio. They regularly talk about Brexit and what is going to happen when the United Kingdom leaves the European Union.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов назначен начальником лаборатории. Он пытается сблизиться с Анной, но она вновь его отталкивает. Она не знает, что Лёшка попал под влияние только что вышедшего из тюрьмы преступника по фамилии Голубев. Тем временем в карьере найден труп молодого мужчины. Крылов сразу же выдвигает неожиданную версию – перед смертью с жертвой кто-то играл в догонялки…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов обнаруживает странную статистику смертей пациентов в клинике, где работал его отец и просит свою помощницу и подругу Матвеевну устроиться туда на работу "под прикрытием". Борису не дают покоя несколько фактов в деле убийства сына олигарха. Крылов проводит необычный следственный эксперимент и понимает, как именно было совершено это преступление…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Макаров приходит к следователю Вере и приносит ей свое экспертное заключение, гласящее, что парень-инвалид, и на самом деле, не виноват. Вера ловит себя на том, что Макаров ей нравится. Неожиданно она предлагает Макарову поужинать вместе. Он соглашается. Алла сводит мужа со своим братом – влиятельным чиновником Константином. Он обещает Игорю похлопотать, чтобы место зампрокурора города досталось ему, но ставит условие: Карпенко должен перестать изменять его сестре. Макаров просит полковника Туманова забрать Лесю из отдела, но тот советует вести себя помягче с коллегами и избегать конфликтов. Макаров доверяет Лесе осмотр места преступления. Вечером после работы Богдану встречает Карпенко. Он снял номер в шикарной гостинице, купил вина и деликатесов. Однако Богдану вызывают на работу. И тогда Карпенко признается ей, что пригласил ее в отель для того, чтобы "красиво" с ней порвать. Выехав на дело, Богдана не замечает, что начинает защищать Макарова перед своими коллегами-операми. К Макарову приезжает Инга Кошевая. Она признается, что была у Иры и дала ей пощечину, но потом ушла. В доказательство того, что она не убивала Иру, Инга предъявляет Макарову запись на мобильнике.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Богдана и Макаров общаются у кофе-автомата, обсуждая детали дела. К ним подходит Вера. Она начинает флиртовать с Макаровым. Он шутки ради говорит, что вечером позвонит ей. Алла Карпенко, подозревая мужа в измене, следит за ним. Она приезжает вслед за ним в управление и видит его, игриво и весело общающегося с Лесей Бильчак. Мимо проходит Богдана. Алла спрашивает у нее, что это за юная девушка. Макаров обнаруживает, что из дела его сестры исчезла одна страница. Он решает поговорить со следователем Логиновым. Богдана узнает от Макарова, что он не позвонил Вере, и заставляет его позвонить со своего мобильника. За Лесей Бильчак снова приезжает байкер. Но Щеглов отшивает его. Макаров звонит следователю Логинову и заявляет, что сейчас же приедет к нему домой. Логинов посылает Макарова к черту, а затем сам звонит кому-то и жалуется, что Макаров под него копает. Макаров приезжает к Логинову и обнаруживает его мертвым. До приезда полиции Макаров успевает осмотреть труп и обнаруживает, что в правой руке тот сжимает ключ. Макаров колеблется: он хочет взять ключ, но не может по долгу службы. Затем он делает оттиск, вытирает ключ платком и снова вкладывает его в руку Логинова.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Начальник Экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД Андрей Макаров - настоящий спец. Вместе со своими подчиненными - экспертом Ройзманом, компьютерщиком Стасом Кимом и молоденькой практиканткой Лесей Бильчак он выезжает на места преступлений в составе оперативно-следственной бригады, в которую также входят оперативники угро Киценко и Щеглов и следователь Богдана Ковальская. Год назад Макарова устранили от расследования смерти девушки, в которой был замешан депутатский сынок Кушнир. А месяц назад произошло убийство сестры Макарова Ирины, которое списали на обычное ограбление. Макаров уверен, что это было преднамеренное преступление, и он полон решимости найти убийцу.Макаров работает в связке со следователем Богданой Ковальской. Мужа у женщины нет, но есть любовник - судебный прокурор Карпенко, который год назад отстранил Макарова от работы. Макарову предстоит расследовать множество запутанных дел, разоблачить нечистых на руку чиновников, найти убийцу сестры и отстоять свое чувство к Богдане.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Начальник Экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД Андрей Макаров - настоящий спец. programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Несколько бомб заложено экстремистской группой защитников окружающей среды. У Группы Один есть только девяносто минут, чтобы предотвратить взрывы. В то время как Спайк обезвреживает одну бомбу, Лу случайно наступает на мину. Спайк любым способом пытается спасти своего друга. Но когда стало ясно, что любая попытка спасти его, скорее всего, приведет к смерти Спайка, Лу принёс себя в жертву.

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев
programme.desc: Главные события сериала разворачиваются в столице до появления Национальной полиции, во время волны резонансных преступлений. За расследование запутанных дел берется лучший оперативник города, нетипичный майор и любимчик женщин Виктор Таран. Объявив войну криминальному миру, он переходит дорогу руководству, влиятельным авторитетам и завистливым коллегам.

programme.title: Ментовские войны. Киев

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Талантливый криминалист Борис Крылов попадает вместе с отцом в автомобильную аварию. Отец погибает на месте, а Крылов покидает больницу в инвалидном кресле. Он уверен, что авария была подстроена и убийство отца, известного хирурга, было спланировано. Чтобы провести собственное расследование, Крылов соглашается вернуться к работе в полиции…

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Расследование в больнице не продвигается, улик у Крылова нет. Голубев рассказывает Алеше, что он его кровный отец. Лариса лжет Крылову по непонятным причинам. На рассвете в парке обнаруживают тело обеспеченной женщины. Она была известна в городе, как жестокая и несправедливая руководительница, увольнявшая людей за малейшие недочеты. Поэтому подозреваемых много.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Борис выясняет, что нападение на Ларису — инсценировка. Но бывшая жена запутывает мужчину. Борис признается Анне в любви, но ей не до романтики: проблемы с сыном усугубляются, Алеша обвиняет мать в том, что она скрыла правду об отце. В убийстве женщины в парке подозревают ее многочисленных ухажеров. Но Крылову удается установить реальную цепь событий.

programme.title: Консультант
programme.desc: Крылов узнает, что погиб один из подозреваемых в деле об аварии. Кто-то считает эксперта серьезным врагом. Анна в шоке от новости о том, что сын связался с Голубевым. В безлюдной части города обнаружено тело мужчины в женском облачении. Погибший — трансвестит, завсегдатай престижного клуба для лиц нетрадиционной ориентации. Когда Крылов начал копаться в деле, убили еще одного постоянного посетителя клуба.

programme.title: Спецы
programme.desc: Начальник Экспертно-криминалистической лаборатории МВД Андрей Макаров - настоящий спец. Вместе со своими подчиненными - экспертом Ройзманом, компьютерщиком Стасом Кимом и молоденькой практиканткой Лесей Бильчак он выезжает на места преступлений в составе оперативно-следственной бригады, в которую также входят оперативники угро Киценко и Щеглов и следователь Богдана Ковальская. Год назад Макарова устранили от расследования смерти девушки, в которой был замешан депутатский сынок Кушнир. А месяц назад произошло убийство сестры Макарова Ирины, которое списали на обычное ограбление. Макаров уверен, что это было преднамеренное преступление, и он полон решимости найти убийцу.Макаров работает в связке со следователем Богданой Ковальской. Мужа у женщины нет, но есть любовник - судебный прокурор Карпенко, который год назад отстранил Макарова от работы. Макарову предстоит расследовать множество запутанных дел, разоблачить нечистых на руку чиновников, найти убийцу сестры и отстоять свое чувство к Богдане.

programme.title: Спецы

programme.title: Горячая точка
programme.desc: Сотрудники полиции участвуют во всех особо важных делах – спасении заложников и переговорах с террористами, эвакуации жителей и обезвреживании бомб, охоте на серийного убийцу и даже решении семейных конфликтов. В арсенале у участников ГСР (группы стратегического реагирования) не только высокотехнологичное оружие, но еще и быстрый ум, интуиция и… багаж собственных проблем и травм, которые часто влияют на их работу.

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: When Anais enlists her dads help with her science project, Richards GUT becomes its own brilliant thinking entity, separate from the original Richard we all know, and Anais must choose between the two.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: After tasting Masamis gourmet, double-truffle mac-n-cheese at lunch, Gumball decides to do whatever it takes to get a full serving of the delicious meal.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesnt get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: After a renowned Oracle predicts that Lana will only bring ruin and disaster to her loved ones, she leaves the Mighty Windbreaker to live as a hermit on a small, deserted island to protect her crew from her jinx, only to befriend a herd of Coiffawns to whom she becomes a shepherdess. But when Horatius wishes to use their hair for nefarious purposes, Lana resolves to forge her own destiny, along with the herd, beyond anyones wildest predictions.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is a super-feisty, forward-thinking and passionate 11-year-old girl, who is also the heir to her fathers adventuring ship, the Mighty Windbreaker. Along with her captain dad and his diverse crew (an orc, a dwarf, a barbarian and a cyclops), she sails across the Ten Realms, dreaming of becoming one of the greatest adventurers of all time. But first, she must overcome some challenging obstacles: impulsivity, stubbornness, extreme curiosity, disdain for rules … and a love of pancakes. All the best things about her!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: The Titans learn about the magic of soccer. / When Beast Boys head starts to rattle Robin suggests that he should find a hobby so that his brain will stop shrinking. Beast Boy and his brain agree to take up gardening. / Gizmo convinces the Titans hes kidnapped Cyborg when in reality Cyborgs just hanging out in the HIVE tower with his girl Jinx. / Raven is cursed to be nice; meanwhile Starfire is about to marry a pot of chili.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin accidentally create a loveable monster that eats their family. / Anais arrives in the bedroom to find a messy crime-scene and her Daisy doll missing. She realises Gumball and Darwin are the chief suspects. / A mysterious figure from Nicoles past shows up and challenges her to a fight, but the kids are surprised when she refuses. / A compilation of some of the funniest, most bizarre clips uploaded onto the internet by the people of Elmore. / When Rob purchases a universal remote from the Awesome Store he discovers he can control the universe. He rewinds into the past and remembers Gumball had left him in The Void. / When we last saw Gumball he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. / Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting. / Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. 1

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is a super-feisty, forward-thinking and passionate 11-year-old girl, who is also the heir to her fathers adventuring ship, the Mighty Windbreaker. Along with her captain dad and his diverse crew (an orc, a dwarf, a barbarian and a cyclops), she sails across the Ten Realms, dreaming of becoming one of the greatest adventurers of all time. But first, she must overcome some challenging obstacles: impulsivity, stubbornness, extreme curiosity, disdain for rules … and a love of pancakes. All the best things about her!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Mordecai the blue jay and Rigby the raccoon hate having to do work as groundskeepers at the local park, trying to slack off whenever they can. When they have simple problems to solve, they often lead to a surreal, extreme, and often supernatural misadventures. Usually this makes their boss, Benson (a gumball machine) extremely angry and on the verge to fire them and annoys their coworker, Skips (a yeti, voiced by Mark Hamill). The pair are always saved by the other manager/owner Pops (a man with a lollipop-shaped head) as he enjoys their constant antics. Co-workers Muscle-Man (an overweight, green man) and Hi-Five Ghost sometimes get involved in the shenanigans, but usually find a way out and leave Mordecai and Rigby in the firing line.

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson, a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin, he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city, during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters, The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny, amazing, sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense, Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes. / Gumball and Darwin must apologise to everyone they know after getting a threatening message on Elmore Plus. / Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less... / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. Mom explains Yuki Masamis mother is an old school friend and repeatedly refuses to fight her despite further provocation. However when Yuki threatens to get Mom fired from her job Mom has no choice but to partake in a rematch of a karate match her and Yuki had fought as children.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Lana Longbeard
programme.desc: Lana is a super-feisty, forward-thinking and passionate 11-year-old girl, who is also the heir to her fathers adventuring ship, the Mighty Windbreaker. Along with her captain dad and his diverse crew (an orc, a dwarf, a barbarian and a cyclops), she sails across the Ten Realms, dreaming of becoming one of the greatest adventurers of all time. But first, she must overcome some challenging obstacles: impulsivity, stubbornness, extreme curiosity, disdain for rules … and a love of pancakes. All the best things about her!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: The Stump Kids seek Kenneths help but find an annoyed Xavier instead - they visit the Elders who were once friends with Kenneth and David calls him, but Mark gets into an argument over how much he has changed. When David and Barry leave and the kids have no answer, they watch Kenneths anime, realise that the Heart of the Forest is from the show, and vow to find it... but all while unaware that Xavier is spying on them with his drones.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must help Principal Brown have body confidence about his butt in order to be allowed to do his poem about butts at the Poetry Recital.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Richard must retrace the memories of his day in order to figure out what "the thing" is, so Nicoles family dinner with Granny Jo Jo wont be another epic failure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball wants to take down Miss Simian after she punishes him for not respecting his school-provided calculator.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must face his demons and overcome an embarrassing incident from his past if he wants to finally summit the dreaded rock-climbing wall in gym class.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: When Muscle Mans father, Muscle Dad, dies, Benson asks Mordecai and Rigby to go along with Muscle Man to spread the ashes of his fathers hat (which reads "Worlds Greatest Trucker") at the highest point at the Trucker Hall of Fame. While at a truck stop, three truckers tell Mordecai and Rigby that Muscle Mans dad wasnt really a trucker like he told Muscle Man when he was a kid but instead he was a forklift driver.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Axel, a 9-year-old boy who can transform into a living action figure, gains a wild new perspective on the world as he wrangles a team of quirky smart-toys on the biggest small adventures a kid could ever imagine. Life as a toy superhero has its pluses and minuses. On the upside, Axel has massive mecha suit power, a cool energy sword, an impenetrable shield and other abilities he himself hasnt even discovered yet. Axel is much stronger, more skilled and faster than when hes his human self. On the downside, toy Axel is only seven-inches tall, and the world around him is no longer adapted to his size: the garden turns into a huge mysterious jungle, a sandbox becomes a desert...! The real world gets a whole lot more complicated and dangerous when Axel sees it from a toy point of view!

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Nicole wants a new family portrait where everyones entire face is in the photo and theyre all smiling.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: The Wattersons must get Anais to Daisyland before the park closes for good.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes. / Gumball and Darwin must apologise to everyone they know after getting a threatening message on Elmore Plus. / Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less... / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Fallers grapple with gnarly timber, but Jareds company and first $100k royalty payment are in jeopardy if he cant wrestle a 140-ton beast uphill.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Parkers Trail
programme.desc: Following on from his earlier adventures prospecting for gold in the contiguous 48 states, Gold Rush: Parkers Trail focuses on the further exploits of presenter Parker Schnabel as he attempts to make new discoveries in other areas. With his companion, Rick Ness, Schnabel endeavours to travel the deadly Klondike Trail over the Chilkoot Pass and up the Yukon River to Dawson City tracing the steps of the 1897 Gold Rush prospectors. Other series take Schnabel on a hiking and mining undertaking in Guyana; to Papua New Guinea where they sail, fly, hike and drive to reach their destination; and to Australia, the island nation that experienced several gold rushes from 1851 onwards.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Fallers grapple with gnarly timber, but Jareds company and first $100k royalty payment are in jeopardy if he cant wrestle a 140-ton beast uphill.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: The Pool Master
programme.desc: The Pool Master is a show presented by Anthony Archer-Wills, a top pool expert, landscape architect and artist. Team of professionals lead by him design and build amazing one-of-a-kind pools, which are in great demand among homeowners. After seeing masterpiece by Anthony, you will never agree to have a rectangle with water for swimming. Multipurpose pools for exercising and entertainment full of flowers, waterfalls, decorated with natural stone according to every taste and wallet will take your breath away.
