programme.title: UEFA Champions League. Man City - Galatasaray
Дневники Темного
programme.desc: Телеканал ТЕТ подготовил для вас нечто очень неожиданное. Проект придется по вкусу всем любителям загадочных мистических историй. События происходят в фантастическом городе Темный. В нем живут вампиры, оборотни и другие существа. Все здесь живет и дышит, даже стены домов. Попасть в этот загадочный город совсем не сложно, а вот покинуть - невероятно сложно. Однажды в город приезжает журналист. Его задача - освещать события, происходящие в Темном. Однако все осложняется тем, что отличить где правда, а где только галлюцинации, в городе бывает невероятно трудно. В каждом выпуске он расследует новые мистические дела. Удастся ли ему раскрыть их и спасти жизни людей? Сможет ли журналист выжить в таинственном городе? А выбраться из него? - Узнавайте в мистическом сериалы "Дневники Темного".

programme.title: Дневники Темного

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. Славик уезжает на заработки. Пользуясь тем, что Славик в коме, Алёна выгоняет Надежду с детьми из квартиры. После длительных скитаний Надежда оставляет младенца в бэби-боксе. Соколова и Борадзе предлагают Глаше уволиться по собственному желанию. Борадзе сообщает коллективу о том, что подкидыша усыновила семья Нескоромовых. Коллектив перинатального центра прощается с Милославской - сердце коллеги остановилось. Славик выходит из комы, Алёна признается ему в своем вранье.

programme.title: Дневники Темного
programme.desc: Телеканал ТЕТ подготовил для вас нечто очень неожиданное. Проект придется по вкусу всем любителям загадочных мистических историй. События происходят в фантастическом городе Темный. В нем живут вампиры, оборотни и другие существа. Все здесь живет и дышит, даже стены домов. Попасть в этот загадочный город совсем не сложно, а вот покинуть - невероятно сложно. Однажды в город приезжает журналист. Его задача - освещать события, происходящие в Темном. Однако все осложняется тем, что отличить где правда, а где только галлюцинации, в городе бывает невероятно трудно. В каждом выпуске он расследует новые мистические дела. Удастся ли ему раскрыть их и спасти жизни людей? Сможет ли журналист выжить в таинственном городе? А выбраться из него? - Узнавайте в мистическом сериалы "Дневники Темного".

programme.title: Дневники Темного

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Помимо главной мелодраматической линии отношений героев, фильмы из подборки "Семейных мелодрам" содержат и философский, и морально-нравственный подтекст, и авторскую позицию по ключевым вопросам бытия. Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Женский доктор
programme.desc: Действие разворачивается в новой современной клинике, которую основал профессор Юрий Климов. Бывшему тестю доктора Романа Широкова остался лишь год до выхода на пенсию, и за это время он должен найти достойного преемника. Но это не главная причина, по которой профессор вновь приглашает Романа работать вместе. Роман Широков – единственный, кто может довести до конца инновационную научную разработку, от которой зависит судьба дочери профессора - Нины. Однако инвесторы и сотрудники клиники не рады появлению нового профессионала.

programme.title: Окно жизни
programme.desc: Славик и Надежда оказываются жертвами квартирных аферистов, поэтому после рождения второго ребёнка они вынуждены жить с семьёй Славика. Его сестра Алёна недовольна таким соседством. Славик уезжает на заработки. Пользуясь тем, что Славик в коме, Алёна выгоняет Надежду с детьми из квартиры. После длительных скитаний Надежда оставляет младенца в бэби-боксе. Соколова и Борадзе предлагают Глаше уволиться по собственному желанию. Борадзе сообщает коллективу о том, что подкидыша усыновила семья Нескоромовых. Коллектив перинатального центра прощается с Милославской - сердце коллеги остановилось. Славик выходит из комы, Алёна признается ему в своем вранье.

programme.title: Дневники Темного
programme.desc: Телеканал ТЕТ подготовил для вас нечто очень неожиданное. Проект придется по вкусу всем любителям загадочных мистических историй. События происходят в фантастическом городе Темный. В нем живут вампиры, оборотни и другие существа. Все здесь живет и дышит, даже стены домов. Попасть в этот загадочный город совсем не сложно, а вот покинуть - невероятно сложно. Однажды в город приезжает журналист. Его задача - освещать события, происходящие в Темном. Однако все осложняется тем, что отличить где правда, а где только галлюцинации, в городе бывает невероятно трудно. В каждом выпуске он расследует новые мистические дела. Удастся ли ему раскрыть их и спасти жизни людей? Сможет ли журналист выжить в таинственном городе? А выбраться из него? - Узнавайте в мистическом сериалы "Дневники Темного".

programme.title: Страх в твоем доме
programme.desc: Боль и страдания, которые причиняют самые близкие люди, невыносимы. Дом из крепости становится тюрьмой. И в поисках выхода людям приходится идти на самые невероятные поступки. Ни один сценарист не сможет придумать такие сюжетные ходы, которые порой закручивает сама жизнь. В социальной докудраме "Страх в твоем доме" - только реальные истории, случившиеся с реальными людьми. Мы реконструируем события, основываясь на откровенных рассказах их участников, а наши эксперты - юристы и психологи - комментируют их и помогают найти выход из сложных, порой тупиковых ситуаций.

Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Семейные мелодрамы
programme.desc: Это не выдуманные истории, а реконструкция реальных событий, которые могут случиться с каждой семьей. В каждой семье свои "Семейные мелодрамы", конфликты, накопившиеся проблемы с долговыми ямами, изменами, трудными детьми и конфликтами с родителями. Какой выход из этих ситуаций, достигших наивысшего апогея, когда никто не хочет его искать? Как же тогда жить дальше? Эти фильмы не заканчиваются хэппи-эндом, но, тем не менее, они будут интересны самому широкому кругу зрителей: от самых маленьких до людей в возрасте. Сюжет фильма обычно предполагает некое размышление или обсуждение, потому что он поднимает важные философские вопросы, заставляет задуматься о понятиях "любовь", "дружба", "верность", "предательство". Вместе с тем, это не нудное поучительное рассуждение. Ленты также повествуют о личном выборе героя в сложных жизненных обстоятельствах, которые будут близки всем зрителям.

programme.title: Pirates of Somalia
programme.desc: In 2008, rookie journalist Jay Bahadur forms a half-baked plan to embed himself among the pirates of Somalia. He ultimately succeeds in providing the first close-up look into who these men are, how they live, and the forces that drive them.

programme.title: The Last Day of August
programme.desc: Dan (Michael Izquierdo) was paralyzed just over a year ago. Following months of recovery and overwhelmed by lifes new realities, he retreated to a family cabin in upstate New York. On the last day of August, his closest friends arrive unannounced to confront him about his recent reclusive and self-destructive behavior. Wanting to support him, yet skeptical of his psychological health, they attempt the tight-rope walk of loving confrontation in the hopes of convincing Dan to return home. Friendships are tested and love reveals itself in this independent drama about breaking down and breaking through. "The Last Day of August" is about the enduring power of love and friendship, and the struggle to overcome the mental and physical barriers that confront those living with addiction and disability. How we react to tragedy defines us, and when loved ones grapple with immense personal suffering, its not always apparent how to respond and whether the help we have to give is the help thats truly needed. This film is a personal examination of how destructive behaviors such as substance abuse and self-isolation emerge from trauma, and how one finds the strength to overcome.

programme.title: Black Cop
programme.desc: A black police officer gets pushed to the edge after he is profiled and assaulted by the colleagues he worked side by side with, so he decides to get revenge and take his frustrations out on the community that he swore to protect.

programme.title: Operation Chromite
programme.desc: In 1950, just a few months after North Korean forces have overrun most of South Korea, an American-led United Nations Command is deployed to Korea to aid the struggling South Koreans. General Douglas MacArthur devises a secret plan to attack behind enemy lines at the port city of Incheon. The risky strategy is opposed by leaders of the other military branches, forcing MacArthur to devise a clandestine operation to gather essential information from within occupied Incheon by coordinating a weeklong South Korean intelligence operation known as "X-Ray".

programme.title: Citizen Verdict
programme.desc: Marty Rockman, producer of the hit reality show "So Sue Me," has a brand new concept: "Citizen Verdict." Every week, a real-life criminal case will be tried before the American people, but this time, they will also be the jury. If the defendant is found guilty in a death penalty case, Rockman will broadcast the execution.

programme.title: Mayor Cupcake
programme.desc: A hard-working cupcake maker is inadvertently elected mayor of a small town burdened with debt. With no formal experience or education to speak of, she must rely on her street smarts to clean up the town.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: The story of Ben Sweet (Nick Roth), an eighteen-year-old middle-class man who enrolls at the University of California, Berkeley, in 1968 to study accounting and avoid the draft. There, he plunges into a life of sex, drugs, and rock n roll, as well as political activism that turns his conservative world upside down and sets him on a path of self-discovery.

programme.title: Scout Camp
programme.desc: Sixteen-year-old York Hayes, leader of the Fire Dragon Scout Troops, returns to Camp Rahuta for his final scout camp. York has decided to take the best step of his life.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: I Could Never Be Your Woman
programme.desc: Rosie, a divorced mother, lives with her daughter in LA. But her life is not exactly ideal. The tv show she has been working on seems doomed. Her ex-husband just had a baby with a younger woman, while her daughter has started dating boys!

programme.title: The Sandman
programme.desc: One fine morning, Benno finds sand in his bed. While he tries to ignore this at first, he soon must realize that he himself is loosing the sand. Day after day the sand increases and soon his time literally starts running short. Finally he is left no choice but to ask Sandra for help, who runs a small coffee shop under his apartment. Although Benno hates her with a passion, he started having dreams of her every night. What could Sandra and the dreams have to do with the sand?

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Wings Of Eagles
programme.desc: The continuing true story of Eric Liddells glorious life after winning Olympic gold in the 1924 Paris Olympics. Liddell has returned to China, where he was born to missionary parents, modestly avoiding celebrity in order to teach local schoolchildren. In 1937, the Japanese invade China at the outset of WWll. Liddell with his friend Xu Niu, a street smart resistance fighter, recognize the increasing danger so Liddell sends his wife, Florence and their two daughters to safety in Canada. Duty-bound, Liddell stays to minister to the civilian victims. Liddell and other foreign nationals are taken as prisoners and placed in one of the many Japanese internment camps where they are forced to endure for two years. Before the Japanese surrender, Liddell succumbs to a brain tumor. Yet his message of hope became immortal. Eric Liddells legacy continues to this day as he remains admired as a champion for life.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: The Cooler
programme.desc: Bernie Lootz (William H. Macy) is a long-time "cooler" at the Shangri-La casino in Las Vegas: he is paid to bring his black cloud to any table where a gambler is on a roll. But when Bernies luck starts changing for the better--thanks in part to a pretty cocktail waitress--he suddenly loses his cooling talents, incurring the ire of the casino owner in the process.

programme.title: Cleanskin
programme.desc: Thriller. Thriller, produced in 2012. Co-produced by the USA and the UK. A British secret service agent is faced with the task of pursuing and eliminating a British-born suicide bomber and his terrorist cell.

programme.title: Hangman
programme.desc: Mystery movie. American mystery, produced in 2017. Retired homicide detective Ray Archer and his partner, ex FBI agent Will Ruiney, are assigned to track down a vicious serial killer, who is playing a twisted version of the childrens game Hangman.

programme.title: The Zodiac
programme.desc: THE ZODIAC takes a different look at the famous Zodiac Killer case from other screen treatments of the murders. More than a simple crime story, the film is an emotional thriller focusing on the murders impact on victims, their families and the wider community. The film follows a police detective and his son who become obsessed with the murders and endanger their family in the process.

programme.title: Jungle Boy
programme.desc: In a humble village on the edge of the jungle, a young boy strays from his mother to play with a monkey. Lost in the jungle, he is saved by the great elephant, who will raise him as a member of the great family of animals. When he grows up he helps to protect the jungle from a ruthless poacher.

programme.title: McCinseys Island
programme.desc: A former secret agent finds a treasure map and decides to find the loot. But he is not the only one.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: In 1941 China under the Japanese rule, Ma Yuan is forced to work in railroad construction used for transferring Japanese equipment. He decides together with a team of rebels to sabotage a military train with heavy weaponry.

programme.title: The Adventure Scouts
programme.desc: A coming of age movie about a group of boys and girls called "adventure scouts" who return from a camping trip to discover their small town is being held captive by a gang of motorcycle-riding knuckleheads. Using only their scouting knowledge and camping equipment, the kids take down the gang members one by one, reunite with family members, and restore the communitys sense of pride.

programme.title: Saving Lincoln
programme.desc: The true story of Abraham Lincoln and his bodyguard, U.S. Marshal Ward Hill Lamon. This unique film features sets created from actual Civil War photographs.

programme.title: North and South: The Battle of New Market
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Corner Office
programme.desc: The story of a compulsive bureaucrat, Orson, who discovers a secret room.

programme.title: Max Cloud
programme.desc: A space cruiser crash lands on the purple planet of Heinous, an intergalactic prison that is home to the most vile and dangerous villains in the galaxy. All of the crew have perished except for its pilot; intergalactic space hero Max Cloud, the ships hapless chef Jake, and its reluctant Commander, Rexy. Their mission is simple, wait inside their vessel until help arrives and try their best to keep the prisoners outside from getting in, however this is Max Cloud and he doesnt do simple. ...But this is not real life. This is a video-game, and at the helm of the adventure is Sarah, a teenage video game fanatic who immerses herself in fantasy to avoid dealing with her less than packed social life and a strained relationship with her dad, straight laced single parent Tony. After a fallout, Tony bans Sarah from playing games and in a frenzy of teenage emotion Sarah makes a wish, that in the blink of an eye becomes a reality... With a flash of pixelated light Sarah is transported into the video game by the mysterious Space Witch, who exists in an etherial void, behind a secret door, that never appears in the same place twice! So Sarah finds herself trapped inside the game and the only person who can help her is her equally socially defunct but incredibly charming friend, Cowboy, who must control Sarah from her bedroom in Brooklyn and keep her from losing her one life, in a game that cant be paused, that they have never finished before! To make matters worse Sarah has not found herself inside the body of the wonderful Max Cloud, but Jake, thats right... the hapless chef. We follow Sarah as she negotiates the terrifying and dangerous planet of Heinous alongside the ever confident Max and fed up Rexy, jumping back and forth with the real world as the pressure mounts on Cowboy and the real stakes start to rise. They soon encounter stranded Bounty Hunter, Brock Donnelly, and realise they must get off the planet before help arrives as the planets surface burns so hot every day that anything not underground is space liquid! AND to add to the stakes Cowboy must keep his best friend away from the evil clutches of the games villain Revengor, a part man, part machine, lunatic who is hell bent on taking Max Clouds ship and with an army of prisoners and an evil sorcersss called SHEE, his chances look pretty damn good. The action bounces between the video game and the real world as Cowboy and Sarah must come together to get her home, all leading to the ultimate showdown in Revengors lair, where back in Brooklyn, video game expertise arrives in the form of a very unlikely hero. Sit down. Plug in. Its time to play THE INTERGALACTIC ADVENTURES OF MAX CLOUD.

programme.title: Zen Noir
programme.desc: A nameless "noir" detective, still mourning the loss of his wife, investigates a mysterious death in a Buddhist temple, but his logical, left-brained crime-solving skills are useless in the intuitive, non-linear world of Zen.

programme.title: Miss Nobody
programme.desc: Unlucky in love, living at home with her eccentric mom, and stuck in a dead end secretarial job at Judge Pharmaceuticals, Sarah Jane longs for more out of life. Her surprise promotion to junior executive appears to be just the ticket. But with promotion comes a competitive new world of wily, complicated executives, and Sarah Jane begins to eliminate the competition the only way she knows how - murder. During her climb to the top, she unexpectedly falls for the man of her dreams, Detective Bill Malloy - the cop intent on cracking the case of the mysterious deaths at Judge Pharmaceuticals.

programme.title: 4Got10
programme.desc: Brian Barnes (Johnny Messner) wakes up in the desert wounded and with no memory and no idea why hes surrounded by eight bodies, a van with four million in cash and a van full of cocaine. Brian is pursued by not only notorious drug lord Danny Perez (Danny Trejo) who desperately want his money back, and DEA Agent Rooker (Dolph Lundgren), but also a by the corrupt Sheriff Olson (Michael Pare) who will stop at nothing to get his hand on the new found fortune. On the run, Brian discovers the more he remembers the less he wants to know about who he really is.

programme.title: Hit List
programme.desc: Charlotte is a woman with anger management issues whose therapist suggests she write a journal to keep her emotions in check. Unlucky in love, she ventures online to find a boyfriend. Just as she reaches her limit of unsuccessful dates, Charlotte meets her soul mate Lyle. Everything is perfect until Lyle finds Charlottes journal and sets out to prove just how deeply he loves her.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Looks That Kill
programme.desc: This is the story of sixteen-year-old Max as he deals with the ups and downs of being lethally attractive.

programme.title: Atkal tu
programme.desc: Veiksmīga karjeras sieviete Marnija dodas uz dzimto pilsētu, uz vecākā brāļa kāzām. Liels un nepatīkams ir viņas pārsteigums, uzzinot, ka brāļa izredzētā ir Džoanna - Marnijas skolas biedrene, kura skolas laikā nejauki un pat nežēlīgi izturējās pret Marniju. Nu Marnija vēlas panākt, lai Džoanna atvainojas par skolas laiku pāri darījumiem, taču viņas māte Geila iesaka meitai atstāt savu aizvainojumu pagātnē. Mātes domas krasi mainās, kad atklājas, ka Džoannas tante ir Mona - Geilas jaunību dienu draudzene, ar kuru viņas sastrīdējās un kļuva par ienaidniecēm...

programme.title: Pirmsākums
programme.desc: Doms Kobbs ir augstas klases spiegošanas profesionālis, kurš spēj iegūt vērtīgu informāciju no cilvēkiem, iekļūstot viņu sapņu pasaulē. Būdams ļoti pieprasīts korporatīvajā spiegošanā, Kobbs kļuvis par starptautiska līmeņa bēgli, kuru vajā gan konkurenti, gan arī likumsargi. Piekritis veikt pēdējo uzdevumu, Kobbs ar savu palīgu grupu iekļūst kāda jauna biznesmeņa sapņos. Ejot cauri daudzajiem līmeņiem vizuāli iespaidīgajā sapņu pasaulē, Kobbs cenšas rast atbildes uz pagātnes notikumiem savā personīgajā dzīvē, kā arī ar jebkuriem līdzekļiem perfekti paveikt ideālu noziegumu. Galvenajās lomās: Leonardo di Kaprio, Džozefs Gordons Levits, Eliots Peidžs.

programme.title: Slow TV
programme.desc: Pastaiga ziemas brīnumzemē

programme.title: Kas skatāms Filmzone?
programme.desc: Iepazīstinām ar Filmzone filmām.

programme.title: Atkal tu
programme.desc: Veiksmīga karjeras sieviete Marnija dodas uz dzimto pilsētu, uz vecākā brāļa kāzām. Liels un nepatīkams ir viņas pārsteigums, uzzinot, ka brāļa izredzētā ir Džoanna - Marnijas skolas biedrene, kura skolas laikā nejauki un pat nežēlīgi izturējās pret Marniju. Nu Marnija vēlas panākt, lai Džoanna atvainojas par skolas laiku pāri darījumiem, taču viņas māte Geila iesaka meitai atstāt savu aizvainojumu pagātnē. Mātes domas krasi mainās, kad atklājas, ka Džoannas tante ir Mona - Geilas jaunību dienu draudzene, ar kuru viņas sastrīdējās un kļuva par ienaidniecēm...

programme.title: Otrā iespēja
programme.desc: Četrdesmitgadniece Maja strādā lielveikalā un cīnās ar neapmierinātību par nepiepildītajiem sapņiem. Pateicoties draugiem, kas pamatīgi piepušķojuši viņas CV un "Facebook" lapā atrodamo informāciju, Maja pašai par pārsteigumu tiek pieņemta darbā kādā prestižā uzņēmumā.

programme.title: Pirmsākums
programme.desc: Doms Kobbs ir augstas klases spiegošanas profesionālis, kurš spēj iegūt vērtīgu informāciju no cilvēkiem, iekļūstot viņu sapņu pasaulē. programme.desc: Veiksmīga karjeras sieviete Marnija dodas uz dzimto pilsētu, uz vecākā brāļa kāzām. programme.title: Otrā iespēja
programme.desc: Četrdesmitgadniece Maja strādā lielveikalā un cīnās ar neapmierinātību par nepiepildītajiem sapņiem. Pateicoties draugiem, kas pamatīgi piepušķojuši viņas CV un "Facebook" lapā atrodamo informāciju, Maja pašai par pārsteigumu tiek pieņemta darbā kādā prestižā uzņēmumā.

programme.title: Maiņas beigas
programme.desc: Losandželosas ielas patruļas policisti Braiens un Maiks ir partneri, kas savā darbā nepazīst mērenību vai ierobežojumus. Viņu pārziņā ir ielas, kurās notiek latīņamerikāņu un melnādaino bandu asa un nežēlīga savstarpēja cīņa. Pāris reizes pāriniekiem paveicas, un viņi izjauc apjomīgus narkotiku un cilvēku tirdzniecības darījumus, tāpēc meksikāņu kartelis pasūta viņu slepkavības.

programme.title: Vilciena 1 2 3 nolaupīšana
programme.desc: Teroristi paņem ķīlniekos Ņujorkas metro vilciena pasažierus un pieprasa izpirkuma maksu. Vai ķīlniekiem ir iespēja izdzīvot pat tad, ja visas prasības tiks izpildītas?

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Filmas pamatā ir reāli notikumi - lielākās relikviju medības pasaules vēsturē. Otrā pasaules kara beigās, lai glābtu mākslas šedevrus, kurus nacisti konfiscēja visā Eiropā, tiek izveidota internacionāla mākslas vēsturnieku un zinātnieku komanda. Tajā pašā laikā vācu armija, kura ir tuvu savai sakāvei, saņem pavēli iznīcināt visus mākslas darbus, kuri atrodas viņu rokās. Vai puiši, kuri ir pazīstami ar Mikelandželo freskām un Da Vinči gleznām daudz labāk, nekā ar šautenēm un kara mākslu, spēs izglābt cilvēces lielākos kultūras sasniegumus?

programme.title: Maiņas beigas
programme.desc: Losandželosas ielas patruļas policisti Braiens un Maiks ir partneri, kas savā darbā nepazīst mērenību vai ierobežojumus. Viņu pārziņā ir ielas, kurās notiek latīņamerikāņu un melnādaino bandu asa un nežēlīga savstarpēja cīņa. Pāris reizes pāriniekiem paveicas, un viņi izjauc apjomīgus narkotiku un cilvēku tirdzniecības darījumus, tāpēc meksikāņu kartelis pasūta viņu slepkavības.

programme.title: Oušena velna ducis
programme.desc: Denijam Oušenam un viņa bandai ir labs iemesls, lai realizētu ambiciozāko un riskantāko kazino aplaupīšanas plānu - viņiem jāaizstāv viens no savējiem. Taču šoreiz viņiem vajadzēs vairāk nekā tikai veiksmi, lai izputinātu Banku. Pēc sadursmes ar cietsirdīgo kazino īpašnieku Villiju Benku cietis viens no Oušena vīriem - Rubens smagā stāvoklī nonāk slimnīcā. Taču šoreiz uzņēmējs savos aprēķinos ir kļūdījies. Viņš ir uz laiku neitralizējis vienu no Oušena bandas, bet pamatīgi satracinājis pārējos bandas locekļus, dodot viņiem lielisku iemeslu atriebties. Un, kā zināms - atriebība ir salda. Galvenajās lomās: Džordžs Klūnijs, Breds Pits, Als Pačino.

programme.title: Kreilis
programme.desc: Billija Houpa dzīvē viss bija nevainojami - čempiona tituls, skaista sieva un mīļotā meitiņa. Taču vienā brīdī viss apgriežas ar kājām gaisā - traģiskos apstākļos iet bojā viņa sieva, diskvalifikācija ringā, pēc kuras viņu pamet menedžeris, nekādu ienākumu un viņam tiek atņemtas vecāka tiesības. Lai atgūtu visu, kas Billijam ir bijis dārgs, viņam ir jaatrod spēki uzvarēt sava mūža grūtākajā...

programme.title: Laupīšana
programme.desc: Kādam tēvam nav iespēju samaksāt par savas meitas medicīniskajiem izdevumiem. Kā pēdējo salmiņu viņš ar partneri izvēlas aplaupīt kazino. Kad situācija kļūst nekontrolējama, viņi ir spiesti nolaupīt pilsētas autobusu.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. Ar palīdzību no Kongresa viņai izdodas aizsākt vēsturisku normatīvo aktu pieņemšanu, kas palīdzēs turpmāk sievietēm iegūt tādas iespējas un aizsardzību, kāda līdz šim nav bijusi.

programme.title: Ideālā Ferdinanda Čevala pils
programme.desc: Ševals ir pastnieks, kurš katru dienu ceļo pa Dromas upes apkārtni. Viņš satiek savas dzīves īsto sievieti Filomenu, un no viņu savienības piedzimst Alise. Tad viņš metas trakā azartspēlē: savām rokām uzcelt viņai neticamu pili.

programme.title: Vīriešu siržu valdzinātāja
programme.desc: Romantiska drāma, kas uzņemta politiski uzlādētajā 60. gadu pirmajā pusē. Kāda sieviete atgriezusies savās mājās dienvidos, un atklāj, ka viņas iespējas ir būtiski ierobežotas. programme.title: Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā
programme.desc: "Aiz kraujas rudzu laukā" ir ieskats notikumos, kas veidoja vienu no pretrunīgākajiem un noslēpumainākajiem amerikāņu rakstniekiem – Dž. D. Selindžeru. Filmas darbība risinās 20. gadsimta vidū Ņujorkā, kad jaunais Selindžers meklē savu vietu dzīvē. Pārciestais frontē 2. Pasaules karā, mīlas dēka ar augstāko aprindu jaunkundzi Ūnu ONīlu un pirmie literārie centieni – šī pieredze ir pamatā viņa pasaulē, iespējams, slavenākajam literārajam meistardarbam "Uz kraujas rudzu laukā". Galvenās lomas atveido jaunais britu aktieris Nikolass Holts un sevi jau pierādījušais ASV kino meistars Kevins Speisijs.

programme.title: Ideālā Ferdinanda Čevala pils

programme.title: Fabelmeni
programme.desc: Augot Arizonā pēc Otrā pasaules kara, jaunais Semijs Fabelmens pusaudža gados vēlas kļūt par kinorežisoru. Drīz vien viņš atklāj satriecošu ģimenes noslēpumu un pēta, kā filmu spēks var palīdzēt viņam saskatīt patiesību.

programme.title: Privilēģijas būt vienam
programme.desc: Čārlijs ir introverts pusaudzis un noraizējies, kā viņam klāsies jaunajā skolā. Viņš vēl nenojauš, ka nāksies piedzīvot gan pirmo mīlestību, labākā drauga pašnāvību un paša mentālas problēmas, cenšoties atrast vienaudžu grupu, kurai justies piederīgam. Jautrs un aizkustinošs stāsts par pusaudžu problēmām, kura pamatā ir Stīvena Čobska tāda paša nosaukuma bestsellers, kas jau kļuvis par mūsdienu klasiku. Filma aizraujoši un patiesi attēlo kāpumus un kritumus pusaudža ceļā uz pilngadību. Galvenajās lomās: Logans Lermans, Emma Vatsone, Ezra Millers

programme.title: Mīlestība Bretaņā
programme.desc: Lomās: Fransuā Damjāns, Sesila de Frānsa, Gijs Maršāns, Andrē Vilmss, Alise de Lankesēna, Estēbans. Ērvans ir atraitnis. Kādu dienu viņš uzzina, ka viņa tēvs nemaz nav viņa bioloģiskais tēvs. Ērvans uzmeklē Džozefu, vīru, kuru savulaik pazina viņa māte. Ceļojuma laikā Ērvans iepazīstas ar kādu apburošu būtni Annu. Taču drīz vien viss kļūst pagalam sarežģīti un Ērvanam ir jāizlemj, vai Anna viņam ir patiesi piemērota romantiskai saiknei.

programme.title: Favorīte
programme.desc: Ir 18. gadsimta sākums. Anglija karo ar Franciju, tomēr, neraugoties uz to, pīļu sacīkstes skriešanā un mielošanās ar ananasiem ir gluži ikdienišķa augstdzimušo aprindu izklaide. Tronī valda vārgulīgā karaliene Anna, taču sliktās veselības dēļ viņas vietā par valstī notiekošo atbild draudzene lēdija Sāra. Kad pilī ierodas jauna kalpone Ebigeila, viņas šarms Sāru apbur. Sāra uzņemas rūpes par Ebigeilu, kura nu saskata iespēju atgriezties pie savām aristokrātiskajām saknēm. Karš un ārpolitika pamazām aizņem arvien vairāk Sāras ikdienas, un Ebigeila nevilcinās kļūt par jauno karalienes kompanjoni. Abu starpā uzplaukst draudzība, dodot Ebigeilai iespēju īstenot savas ambīcijas. Un viņa neļaus stāties sev ceļā nedz sievietei, nedz vīrietim, nedz politikai vai zaķim.

programme.title: Pianists
programme.desc: Polijas galvaspilsēta Varšava, 20. gadsimta 30. gadi. Poļu-ebreju mūziķis, pianists Vladislavs Špīlmans plūc panākumu laurus Polijā. Pienākot Otrajam pasaules karam, viņš brīnumainā kārtā izdzīvo pret ebrejiem vērstajā holokaustā. Špīlmans cīnās par izdzīvošanu kara plosītajā Varšavā un pēc kara atkal var pievērsties savai iemīļotajai nodarbei - klaviermūzikas spēlēšanai. Filmas panākumu kontā ir trīs "Oskari" kategorijās "Labākais galvenās lomas aktieris", "Labākais režisors" un "Labākais adaptētais scenārijs", kā arī vairākas Kinoakadēmijas un citu balvu nominācijas. 2016. gadā tā tika ierindota "BBC 100 labāko 21. gadsimta filmu" sarakstā.

programme.title: Mīlestība Bretaņā
programme.desc: Lomās: Fransuā Damjāns, Sesila de Frānsa, Gijs Maršāns, Andrē Vilmss, Alise de Lankesēna, Estēbans. Ērvans ir atraitnis. programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: House Of Knives
programme.desc: The final contenders compete, and one chef is selected to challenge the ruler head-to-head for the culinary crown and the $100,000 prize.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: Molly Yeh is a cookbook author who combines her country lifestyle with her Jewish and Chinese heritage to create the most delicious new dishes. A former big city girl, Yeh is multi talented, a successful blogger and classically trained musician, its food that ultimately stole her heart. Learn lots of tricks and tips with Yeh as she cooks up her personal favourite recipes for every occasion, from family visits to brunch with the girls to a classic farm supper! This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Alex Vs America
programme.desc: Chef Alex Guarnaschelli and host Eric Adjepong welcome three aspiring shellfish experts and watch them cook up a storm, as they go through two rounds of cooking. The hosts select their favourite contestant and dish, after which they discuss the judges comments.

programme.title: BBQ Brawl: Flay V. Symon
programme.desc: Join our hosts, renowned celebrity chefs and restaurateurs Bobby Flay and Michael Symon, as they test the skills of eight expert barbecue connoisseurs. Filmed at the Star Hill Ranch in Austin, Texas, the eight chefs are divided into two teams but, in order to claim first pick for their team, Bobby and Michael go head-to-head in a backyard BBQ challenge. Each episode sees one of the chefs being eliminated from the show until there is only one left, the winner who is awarded the title of Master of Cue. The weekly contests aim to reveal the chefs talents and expose their weaknesses and include tasks such as cooking up a tomahawk rib-eye and taking on a Texas beef challenge.

This show is an absolute treat.

programme.title: Girl Meets Farm
programme.desc: One of Molly Yehs best friends is in town for their birthdays, so Molly is making her most-delicious party bites for the double celebration. She starts with her pretty in pink Pickled Beet Deviled Eggs and addictive Spinach and Feta Rugelach. She fries up crispy Walleye Cakes and assembles a Party Platter with Pickle Dip. For a dessert thats worthy of two celebrations, Molly makes chocolate Mozart Birthday Balls.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Chopped

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: Battle Of the Decades
programme.desc: In this all-new series, teams comprised of two chefs from different generations will tackle challenges in which they must mesh retro ingredients with todays viral food trends to bridge the culinary gap and show off their expertise.

programme.title: Harry Potter: Wizards of Baking
programme.desc: James and Oliver Phelps host as pairs of professional bakers create spellbinding edible showpieces on the actual Harry Potter film sets. Guest actors from the films share behind-the-scenes experiences as they join judges Carla Hall and Jozef Youssef.

programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: After combating countless "impossible dinners," Chef Robert Irvine faces a daunting new challenge: save Americas most desperate restaurants from impending failure in just two days with only $10,000. In his new prime-time Food Network series, Restaurant: Impossible, Robert uses creativity and resourcefulness along with a lot of muscle in his fight to rescue these restaurants and give hope to the owners and their employees. Day one of the extreme mission begins with a thorough business assessment as Robert launches the restaurant into full service, closely observes the staff and kitchen, and determines their weakest spots. Then, he springs into action by updating the menu, retraining the staff and implementing aesthetic changes with the help of his design team. To ensure a packed house for the grand re-opening at the end of day two, Robert hits the streets to tell the community about the improved restaurant. Will the ruthless schedule, tight budget and ambitious task overcome Roberts lofty goals, or will this tall order result in restaurant triumph?

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Making History
programme.desc: This program presents an in in-depth exploration of the history of Ukraine, with an emphasis on its most recent past. With opinion and analysis from leading historians, scientists, researchers and eye-witnesses, Making History reveals the complex, and often contradictory, stories from yesteryear that still resonate with todays population. The famous, and not-so-famous, characters who helped shape influential events are all remembered in this show.

programme.title: Zaļknābis pie stūres
programme.desc: Viņš ir ļoti jauns un prot ļoti ātri un labi braukt, kad jātiek prom no nozieguma vietas. Tas ir neviens cits kā labākais auto vadītājs, saukts par Mazo. Kad Mazais satiek savu sapņu meiteni, viņš vēlas pamest noziedzīgo pasauli. Taču tas nav tik vienkārši, kā šķiet, kad Mazais tiek iesaistīts vēl vienā noziegumā, kas apdraud viņa dzīvi, mīlestību un brīvību.

programme.title: Cietais rieksts
programme.desc: Šajā spriedzes trillerī, kas pacēla latiņu žanra filmām, Brūss Viliss atveido Ņujorkas policistu Džonu Makleinu, kurš Losandželosā ir ieradies pavadīt brīvdienas ar savu sievu Holiju. Bet, kamēr Makleins gaida, līdz beigsies Holijas darba ballīte, ēkā iebrūk teroristi. Grupējuma vadonis Hanss Grūbers ar saviem padotajiem sagrābj ķīlniekus, bet Makleins tikmēr gatavojas pieteikt viena cilvēka karu, un uzvarēt tajā var tikai Makleins!

programme.title: Operācija "Black Bag"
programme.desc: Izlūkdienesta aģente Katrīna Vudhausa tiek turēta aizdomās par valsts nodevību. Viņas vīrs, leģendārais slepenais aģents Džordžs Vudhauss, saskaras ar nepiespējamu pārbaudījumu – būt uzticīgam savai laulībai vai valstij.

programme.title: Cūka
programme.desc: Robam (Nikolass Keidžs) ir īpašs talants – viņš ir izcils šefpavārs un reiz viņš priecēja savus turīgos klientus ar lieliskiem ēdieniem. Taču, kad nomira viņa sieva, Roba dzīve sabruka. Viņš beidza karjeru un pārcēlās uz nomaļu meža namiņu. Par Roba vienīgo kompanjonu nu kļuvusi trifeļu cūka, ar kuru kopā viņš pelna iztiku, – līdz pēkšņi viņa četrkājainā draudzene tiek nozagta. Lai viņu atgūtu, Robs ir gatavs doties kaut līdz pasaules malai.

programme.title: Viens pats mājās
programme.desc: Ir pagājis labs laiks kopš Ziemassvētkiem, kad Makkalisteru ģimene, dodoties brīvdienās, pirmo reizi aizmirsa mājās Kevinu. Šos Ziemassvētkus Kevins nolēmis pavadīt sava tēta bagātās draudzenes Natālijas milzīgajā savrupmājā. Taču mierīgais vakars viņam kārtējo reizi izvēršas par īstu piedzīvojumu, jo Natālijas māju svētkos nolēmuši apciemot zagļi. Starp citu, vienam no viņiem ar Kevinu ir kārtojami veci rēķini!

programme.title: Runcis zābakos
programme.desc: Vēl pirms leģendārais Runcis Zābakos satiek mums visiem jau zināmo zaļo briesmoni, vārdā Šreks, viņš dodas varonīgiem piedzīvojumiem pilnā ceļojumā, lai kopā ar ideju meistaru Oliņu Aleksandru Boliņu un drosmīgo kaķenīti Kitiju Maigķepu nozagtu Zosi, kas dēj zelta olas. Tas tik būs viens varens un deviņu dzīvību vērts piedzīvojums!

programme.title: Ciems
programme.desc: Kādā ciemā, tālu no pārējās pasaules, norisinās atgadījumu virkne, kas liek iedzīvotājiem apšaubīt savas līdzšinējās pārliecības.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Mīlīgā mazpilsētiņā atrodas melna māja ar nedzīvu zālāju. Kaimiņi pat nenojauš, ka zem mājas atrodas milzu paslēptuve. Sīku pakalpiņu armijas apsargāts, Grū kaldina plānus lielākajai laupīšanai pasaules vēsturē. Viņš ir iecerējis nolaupīt Mēnesi. Jā, Mēnesi! Grū patīk viss ļaunais. Bruņojies ar samazināšanas lāzeru, sasaldēšanas staru un dažnedažādiem kaujas transporta līdzekļiem braukšanai pa zemi un pa gaisu, viņš iznīdē visu, kas gadās ceļā, līdz kādu dienu sastop trīs bārenītes ar apbrīnojamu gribasspēku…

programme.title: X+Y
programme.desc: Zēns, matemātikas ģēnijs ar saskarsmes grūtībām dzīvē un vienaudžu vidū, rod pašpārliecību un jaunus draugus starp britu skolēnu komandas biedriem Starptautiskajā matemātikas olimpiādē.

programme.title: Vēl pa vienai
programme.desc: Oskarotā Tomasa Vinterberga filma par četriem draugiem un kolēģiem, ģimnāzijas skolotājiem. Visi četri cīnās ar nemotivētiem skolēniem un jūtas iestrēguši rutīnā. Nikolaja 40 gadu jubilejā draugu sarunas noved pie norvēģu psihiatra Finna Skorderuda teorijas, ka cilvēks dzīvo ar 0,05 promiļu iztrūkumu. Četrotne nolemj veikt eksperimentu un pārbaudīt šo teoriju dzīvē. Tomēr, eksperimentam turpinoties, vīri sastopas katrs ar savu personīgās dzīves izaicinājumu.

programme.title: Gudričs
programme.desc: Andija Gudriča dzīve tiek apgriezta kājām gaisā, kad viņa sieva uzsāk rehabilitācijas programmu, atstājot viņu vienu ar viņu mazajiem bērniem. Gudričs paļaujas uz Greisu, savu meitu no pirmās laulības, un galu galā kļūst par tēvu, kāds viņai nekad nav bijis.

programme.title: Relikviju mednieki
programme.desc: Patiess stāsts par vērienīgākajām dārgumu medībām pasaules vēsturē. Pārsteidzoša Otrā pasaules kara karavīru komanda saņem pavēli izglābt nacistu nozagtos mākslas šedevrus un nogādāt tos atpakaļ pie īstajiem īpašniekiem. Uzdevums šķita neizpildāms, jo mākslas darbi atradās aiz ienaidnieka līnijas un Vācijas armijai bija pavēlēts pēc Reiha krišanas iznīcināt absolūti visu. Vai tad muzeju direktori, kuratori un mākslas vēsturnieki, kuri labāk pārzināja Mikelandželo darbus, nevis ieročus, varēja cerēt uz izdošanos?

programme.title: Hitman: Aģents
programme.desc: Aģents 47 (Rūperts Frends) ir elitārs slepkava, kurš no ieņemšanas brīža ir ģenētiski radīts būt par ideālu slepkavu. Viņam uzdod nogalināt noziedzīgā sindikāta vadoni, kurš vēlas uzzināt Aģenta 47 spēju noslēpumus, lai radītu īpaši prasmīgu slepkavu armiju

programme.title: Jauns sākums
programme.desc: Greta un viņas draugs Deivs ir muzikanti un dziesmu autori, kopā jau ilgus gadus kopš koledžas laikiem. Brīdī, kad Deivs saņem piedāvājumu ierakstīt albumu no lielas ierakstu kompānijas, viņi pārvācas uz dzīvi Ņujorkā. Jauniegūtās slavas savaldzināts, Deivs pamet Gretu un uzsāk savu jauno mūziķa karjeru. Gretas dzīvē pozitīvu pavērsienu ienes nejauša satikšanās ar Denu, izbijušu ierakstu kompānijas menedžeri. Brīdī, kad Dens ierauga Gretu muzicējam nomaļā pilsētas klubā, viņu vienā mirklī apbur meitenes muzikālais talants un šarms. Līdz ar šo nejaušo sastapšanos abu dzīves ir nesaraujami saistītas, ļaujot sadziedēt brūces un sasniegt mērķus gan profesionālajā karjerā, gan privātajā dzīvē. Jauns dzīves sākums izstāstīts uz Ņujorkas vasaras fona.

programme.title: Kaskadieris
programme.desc: Kolts ir kaskadieris, un, tāpat kā visi kaskadieri, darbā viņš tiek spridzināts, sašauts, avarē, lec laukā pa logiem un krīt no augstākajām virsotnēm – tas viss mūsu izklaidei. Tagad šim strādnieku šķiras varonim pēc negadījuma, kas teju maksā viņam dzīvību, ir jāatrod pazudusi kinozvaigzne, jāatrisina sazvērestība uzņemšanas laukumā un jāmēģina atgūt mūža mīlestība Džodija, vienlaikus darot savu ikdienas darbu. Kas te var nenoiet greizi?

programme.title: After. Pēc kritiena
programme.desc: Tesa ir gatava jaunam dzīves posmam. Spožais prestižas koledžas diploms paver jaunas iespējas – meitene atrod sapņu darbu starptautiskā kompānijā. Viņas nodoms pārcelties uz Sietlu nemaz neiepriecina Hārdinu. Viņa neapmierinātība, pārmetumi un mūžīgā greizsirdība sāpīgi ievaino Tesu un rada bažas. Vai ir vērts visu likt uz kārts un upurēt daudzsološu karjeru? Taču kā lai aizmirst kopā pavadītās naktis un kaislīgos skūpstus, viņa ciešos vīrieša apskāvienus un tuvību, kas padara traku?

programme.title: Grāfs Monte-Kristo
programme.desc: Izbēdzis no cietuma uz salas, kurā, nepatiesi apsūdzēts par valsts nodevību, pavadījis četrpadsmit gadus, Edmunds Dantess atgriežas kā grāfs Monte-Kristo, lai atriebtos vīriem, kas viņu nodevuši.

programme.title: Sliktais ģēnijs
programme.desc: Grupa vidusskolas pēdējo klašu skolēnu no uzņēmējdarbības programmas apvienojas, lai izjauktu krāpniecisku augstskolu uzņemšanas sistēmu.

programme.title: Nejaukais es
programme.desc: Kamēr bijušais dižais ļaundaris Gru sāk iejusties ģimenes cilvēka lomā un mēģina godīgi pelnīt iztiku, pārdodot ievārījumu, Antarktīdā kāds nozog slepenu laboratoriju. Ļaunuma apkarošanas organizācijai ir nepieciešama palīdzība, un tās pārstāvji ierodas pie Gru. Kopā ar organizācijas ekscentrisko aģenti Lūsiju Vaildu viņš secina, ka galvenais aizdomās turamais ir par mirušu uzskatītais supernelietis El Mačo, kura dēls ir ieskatījies Gru vecākajā meitā Margo. Pārlieka vēlēšanās pasargāt meitas un arvien pieaugošās simpātijas pret Lūsiju aizmiglo Gru prātu, tādēļ meklējumi nevedas. Tikmēr kāds nelietis paklusām nolaupa Gru palīgus.

programme.title: Mīlestība dejas ritmā
programme.desc: Talantīgā balerīna Bārlova nolēmusi īstenot savu sapni Amerikas mākslas svētnīcā Ņujorkā. Diemžēl iepazīšanās ar svētnīcas realitāti nav īpaši patīkama – pieredzējusī baleta pasniedzēja Oksana skaidri un gaiši pasaka: Bārlova vēl nav ne tuvu pilnībai. Norijusi krupi, meitene nepadodas un piedalās jaunas Brodvejas deju izrādes atlasē. Režisors Zanders pievērš uzmanību Bārlovai un izvēlas viņu mēģinājumiem. Pēc dažām dienām topošās izrādes kodolam pievienojas talantīgais pianists Čārlijs. Tāpat kā Bārlova, viņš ieradies Ņujorkā, lai īstenotu sapni. Puisim un meitenei rodas simpātijas vienam pret otru, bet Zanders nav vienaldzīgs pret meiteni. Bārlova drīz vien sapinas mīlas trīsstūrī. Izrādes mēģinājumi kļūst arvien intensīvāki, slodze aug, un ne Bārlovai, ne Čārlijam neatliek laika nekam citam. Darbs vaiga sviedros, nemitīgā spriedze, sāncenšu nodevība un cīņa bez kompromisiem prasa visus spēkus.

programme.title: Kā pieradināt pūķi
programme.desc: Vikingu pusaudzis Hikaps dzīvo Berkas salā kopā ar savu valdonīgo tēvu. Kaujas ar pūķiem ir vikingu ikdiena un dzīves veids, taču Hikapu tās neaizrauj. Tā vietā viņš labprātāk nododas visvisādiem izgudrojumiem un apkārtnes iepazīšanai. Reiz kādā no saviem klejojumiem Hikaps sastop ievainotu pūķi, kuram palīdz atkal lidot. Šī sastapšanās maina abu dzīves. Un, kad pienāk iesvētību laiks – lielā iespēja kaujā ar pūķiem sevi pierādīt tēvam un visai ciltij –, Hikaps rīkojas pavisam neparasti.

programme.title: Žanna Dibarī. Karaļa favorīte
programme.desc: Stāsts par karaļa Luija XV pēdējo oficiālo mīļāko Dibarī kundzi.

programme.title: Marija
programme.desc: Marija Kallasa, pasaulē izcilākā operdziedātāja, pavada savas dzīves pēdējās dienas 70. gadu Parīzē, saskaroties ar savu identitāti.

programme.title: Didi
programme.desc: 2008. gadā, pēdējā vasaras mēnesī pirms vidusskolas sākuma, 13 gadus vecs zēns iemācās to, ko viņa ģimene nevar viņam iemācīt: kā slidot, kā flirtēt un kā mīlēt savu mammu.

programme.title: Barijs Sīls: Īstens amerikānis
programme.desc: Stāsts par Bariju Sīlu, amerikāņu lidmašīnas pilotu, kurš iefiltrējās narkotiku kartelī CIP slepena uzdevuma ietvaros 20. gs. 80. gados, kas tiek atmaskots kā pret Irānu vērsta militāra operācija.

programme.title: Nabaga radības
programme.desc: Sava nežēlīgā vīra ietekmē Bella (Emma Stouna) ir izdarījusi pašnāvību, taču ekscentrisks zinātnieks (Vilems Defo) nolemj izglābt sievieti un pārstāda viņai pašas vēl nedzimušā bērna smadzenes. Viņa aizbildniecībā Bella alkst mācīties un iepazīt dzīvi, kas Viktorijas laikmeta stingrajā sabiedrībā viņai līdz šim bijusi liegta. Kopā ar viltīgo un valdzinoši cinisko juristu Dankanu Vederbērnu viņa dodas ceļojumā pāri kontinentiem. Ceļojuma laikā Bella arvien vairāk atbrīvojas no sava laikmeta aizspriedumiem un sabiedrības ierobežojumiem.

programme.title: Slepkavas kodekss
programme.desc: Kad Anna bija bērns, viņu no nāves izglāba leģendārais slepkava Mūdijs. Apguvusi sava glābēja arodu, Anna ir kļuvusi par vienu no prasmīgākajām pasūtījuma slepkavām pasaulē. Kad Mūdijs tiek nogalināts, viņa nozvēras atriebties un nogalināt to, kurš atņēmis dzīvību cilvēkam, kurš viņai iemācījis visu.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Paris - Real Madrid
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Basketbols: BCL. Rytas Vilnius - Galatasaray
programme.desc: Basketball live game.

programme.title: NBA. 76ers - Bucks
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Furthermore, research suggests that it is widely considered to be the premier mens basketball league in the world. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: WRC. Montekarlo 17. ātrumposms

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Sevilla - Athletic Bilbao
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: EuroLeague. Fenerbahce - Anadolu Efes
programme.desc: The EuroLeague is the top-tier European professional basketball club competition since 2000. The competition replaced the FIBA EuroLeague (which was previously called the FIBA European Champions Cup, or simply the European Cup), which had been run by FIBA since 1958. Starting from 2010/2011 season the tournament is named Turkish Airlines Euroleague, due to a sponsorship contract of Turkish Airlines with EuroLeague, and in 2013 the contract was prolonged to 2020. The tournament is aired in 199 countries of the world. The current EuroLeague structure is made up of 16 teams, which each play each other twice, once at home and once away, in a double round robin league regular season, each team plays 30 games. The top 8 placed teams at the end of the regular season advance to playoffs, each plays a 5 game playoff series against a single opponent. The winners of each playoff series advance to the Final Four held in a predetermined city for two days. The Final Four features two semifinals, a third place game, and the championship game, all on the same weekend.

programme.title: Futbols: Ligue 1. Marseille - Lens
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

Design Down Under
programme.desc: Husband and wife design build team, Richie Morris and Georgia Ezra, create one-of-a-kind, modern designs and bespoke spaces for their clients in Melbourne, Australia while juggling their thriving businesses and family of four.

programme.title: Help! I Wrecked My House
programme.desc: American home improvement series. Presenter Jasmine Roth visits the homes of DIY catastrophes to restore them back to a liveable space. Jasmine brings in the professionals to rescue these renovations-gone-wrong and helps homeowners realise their propertys full potential. With half-demolished houses, unfinished floors and plumbing nightmares: these refurbishment mishaps are on a monumental scale. Luckily, with expertise, hard work and vision, Jasmine and her team can hopefully transform these DIY disasters into something beautiful that their owners will love.

programme.title: The Renovator
programme.desc: Marcus Lemonis helps a father and his daughter with a home thats stuck in time after the loss of his wife. Marcus looks to free up space for new family memories.

programme.title: Sin City Rehab
programme.desc: Alison makes a deal on the hacienda and gets her first Vegas flip, but she needs the property to sell for $2 million or shell lose her profit share.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.

programme.title: Island Life
programme.desc: Most people only fantasize about living on an island, but well prove that an Island Life is possible for anyone. Tropical dreamers will be shown island properties that fit into any budget, from ultra-affordable to totally outrageous. Well follow everyday families is search of their own slice of paradise, and prove that fantasy can be reality.

programme.title: Building Roots

Starring husband and wife duo Ben and Cristi Dozier, the series features the couple as they build, design and renovate properties in their dreamy hometown of Pagosa Springs, Colorado. During the series, Ben and Cristi produce one-of-a-kind, highly personalized work that always exceeds their clients expectations.

programme.title: Bargain Mansions
programme.desc: Based in Kansas City, Tamara Day is a restoration expert who believes no home is too big for her to take on. Scouring the city for large, neglected mansions that she can buy on the cheap, she then uses her eye for design to transform these shabby houses into elegant homes. With her dad helping her on each project, they gut the decaying aspects of each house whilst keeping any characteristic and authentic features, enticing deep-pocketed buyers with open concepts and modern layouts. Using her experience from maintaining buildings on the family farm, she turns these decrepit structures into warm homes that are perfect for a family to move in and start creating memories.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
programme.desc: Brian and Mika Kleinschmidt are a formidable husband and wife team. The married couple utilise Brians developing background and Mikas real estate experience to help clients design and build their perfect home in just 100 days. Based in Tampa, Florida, the formidable pair help local residents realise their dreams, and do all they can to ensure their ideal project is completed within the given time frame. Of course, each project comes with new difficulties to overcome, but the proof is in the pudding, and for Brian and Mika, the sweetness of watching families walk into their brand new home is the perfect reward for all their hard work. Reality series.

programme.title: Renovation Impossible
programme.desc: Russell visits an artsy couple after a major setback with the foundation brought renovations on their cramped, dated home to halt.

programme.title: Vacation House for Free
programme.desc: Matt Blashaw realizes couples wishes to own a vacation home mortgage free. The secret? He helps them shop for and renovate a "diamond in the rough" home in their dream location to command top dollar as a vacation rental. The end result? The couple rents out the renovated home for maximum income part of the year, covering all their annual expenses. For the rest of the year they live in a Vacation House for Free!

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: Recent lottery winners look for their perfect dream house in this "House Hunters"-inspired reality show. David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find "My Lottery Dream Home".

programme.title: Unsellable Houses

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous
programme.desc: A husband-and-wife restoration team revive and sell historic houses in their hometown of Bentonville, Arkansas. Dave and Jenny Marrs are both deeply passionate about preserving Bentonvilles examples of aged architecture. They see endless potential in these dilapidated properties, each of which is full of character. Unfortunately for Dave and Jenny, theyre also full of problems! Watch as they transform the homes from fixer to fabulous. Reality series.

programme.title: The Renovator
programme.desc: Marcus Lemonis assists a couple living in his former bachelor pad thats in need of serious upgrades. He transforms the interior and exterior to create a forever home.

programme.title: Sin City Rehab
programme.desc: With a budget over $1 million, Alison takes on her biggest renovation yet with an Amalfi meets Palm Springs inspired theme.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: Jane and Josh come from Texas to Palm Springs, California, in hopes of turning a dated desert dwelling into a fresh and fun vacation getaway.

programme.title: First Time Fixer
programme.desc: A couple raising triplets renovates a lakeside house thats too small for them until they double the square footage and make it their dream home.

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: Flip or Flop
programme.desc: Tarek is a self-proclaimed real estate genius with determination and drive. Christina is Tareks picture-perfect wife, who Tareks friends still cant believe he landed. In each episode of "Flip or Flop", Tarek and Christina flip a new property. From the nail-biting purchase at auction, to the frustrating renovations and maddening showings, to the giddy acceptance of an offer, well follow along as these two relatively novice flippers try their hand at the toughest game in town. From purchase to resale, weaving their personal lives within the story of the flip. From paying cash, sight unseen, for a property at auction, through the hapless remodeling process, to the frantic sale, this young couple is putting everything they have into this venture.
